articles.title: Inaugural ceremony of South Korean President held
articles.content:
Inaugural ceremony of South Korean President held 
    Pyongyang, February 26 (KCNA) -- A Presidential inaugural ceremony took place in South Korea on Feb. 25, according to a news report.
 President Kim Dae Jung retired from office and President-elected Roh Moo Hyun, Democratic Party candidate, was formerly inaugurated as new President, according to the results of the Presidential election held in December last year.

Kim Jong Il's work published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let us reunify the country independently and peacefully through the great unity of the entire nation" was brought out in booklet by the Paleya Publishing House in Russia on February 14.
 The work was published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998). Clarified in it is the historical five-point policy of great national unity, the guideline in achieving the great unity of the Korean nation.    
 The five-point policy requires for the whole nation to base on the principle of national independence, unite under the banner of patriotism, the banner  of national reunification, improve the inter-Korean relations, struggle against the domination and interference of foreign forces and the anti-reunification forces and strengthen the contact, dialogue and solidarity.

articles.title: Collection of Kim Jong Il's works published in Germany
articles.content:
Collection of Kim Jong Il's works published in Germany 
    Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- A collection of Kim Jong Il's works was brought out by the Communist Party of Germany.
 The collection contains works "On having a correct viewpoint and understanding of the Juche philosophy" and "Our socialism centered on the masses shall not perish".

Greetings to Amir of Kuwait
articles.content:
Greetings to Amir of Kuwait
    Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greetings to Jaber al-Ahmed al-Jaber  al-Sabah, Amir of State of Kuwait, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its National Day and the 12th anniversary of its liberation day.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in the future, too, he wished the Amir and the people of Kuwait greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country, peace and stability in the region.

articles.title: South side's delegation leaves
articles.content:
South side's delegation leaves
    Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation to the north-south joint exhibition of materials on the crimes related to the Japanese imperialists' forcible drafting of Koreans led by Kang Man Gil, president of Sangji University of South Korea, left here today by air.
 It was seen off by Ri Jong Hyok, vice-chairman of the Korean Asia-Pacific Peace Committee, and other officials concerned.    
 During its stay, the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the International Friendship Exhibition, the Sinchon Museum, King Tangun's Mausoleum and King Tongmyong's Mausoleum and toured historical relics in the area of Kaesong.
